mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, m.content AS content, DATE_FORMAT(m.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, m.sender_id AS sender_id, m.receiver_id AS receiver_id, m1.name AS sender_name, m2.name AS receiver_name FROM message m INNER JOIN member m1 ON m.sender_id=m1.id INNER JOIN member m2 ON m.receiver_id=m2.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{listCount}

SELECT m.id AS id, m.content AS content, DATE_FORMAT(m.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date, m.sender_id AS sender_id, m.receiver_id AS receiver_id, m1.name AS sender_name, m2.name AS receiver_name FROM message m INNER JOIN member m1 ON m.sender_id=m1.id INNER JOIN member m2 ON m.receiver_id=m2.id WHERE m.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message( content, sender_id, receiver_id, reg_date ) VALUES( #{content}, #{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, now() )
